attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
IT is about time that Travelers and Gypsy have some where to go and our kids get a good Educashion THE Avrige age for a Gypsy or a Traveler is only 50 not because of there life stile no Eases to G.P No Fersilites lots of young and old 
has still no where to live in Leeds and they are getting moved from piller to post.We are part of History and the people of England shude be proud

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
